names.premiumDryDogFoodChickenRice: Premium Dry Dog Food - Chicken & Rice
names.grainFreeWetDogFoodBeefStew: Grain-Free Wet Dog Food - Beef Stew

product.notFoundDesc: The product you are looking for does not exist.

descriptions.premiumDryDogFoodChickenRice: High-quality dry dog food made with real chicken and brown rice. Perfect for adult dogs of all sizes.
descriptions.grainFreeWetDogFoodBeefStew: Delicious grain-free wet dog food with tender beef chunks and vegetables in savory gravy.
descriptions.dogTrainingTreatsChickenFlavor: Small, soft training treats perfect for rewarding good behavior. Made with real chicken.
descriptions.dailyMultivitaminForDogs: Complete daily vitamin supplement to support your dog's overall health and immune system.
descriptions.ropeToyHeavyDuty: Durable rope toy perfect for tug-of-war and chewing. Helps clean teeth while playing.
descriptions.dogLeashRetractable: Heavy-duty retractable leash with comfortable grip handle and 16-foot extension.
descriptions.dogSweaterWarmWinterCoat: Cozy winter sweater to keep your dog warm during cold weather. Machine washable.
descriptions.dogCrateMediumSize: Sturdy metal dog crate with secure locking mechanism. Includes removable tray for easy cleaning.
descriptions.stainlessSteelDogBowlSet: Non-slip stainless steel food and water bowl set. Dishwasher safe and rust-resistant.
descriptions.dogShampooOatmealHoney: Gentle oatmeal and honey shampoo for sensitive skin. Moisturizes and soothes while cleaning.
descriptions.premiumCatKibbleSalmonTuna: High-protein dry cat food with real salmon and tuna. Supports healthy coat and digestion.
descriptions.wetCatFoodChickenPate: Smooth chicken pate with essential nutrients. Perfect for cats who prefer wet food.
descriptions.organicCatnipPremiumGrade: 100% organic catnip grown without pesticides. Drives cats wild and encourages play.
descriptions.interactiveCatToyFeatherWand: Extendable feather wand toy to keep your cat active and engaged. Replaceable feathers included.
descriptions.catScratchingPostTallTower: Multi-level scratching post with sisal rope and plush platforms. Perfect for stretching and scratching.
descriptions.clumpingCatLitterUnscented: High-quality clumping clay litter that controls odors naturally. Dust-free formula.
descriptions.catCarrierAirlineApproved: Sturdy airline-approved cat carrier with ventilation windows and secure latching system.
descriptions.catBedMemoryFoamCushion: Ultra-comfortable memory foam cat bed with removable washable cover. Perfect for senior cats.

notifications.promotion: Special Offer Just for You! Get 10% off your first order with code WELCOME10. Valid for new customers only.
notifications.orderConfirmed: Your order has been confirmed and is being processed. We'll notify you when it's ready to ship.
notifications.orderShipped: Good news! Your order is on its way. Track your package using the tracking number provided.
